allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: MSS Portal - Corporate intranet portal

NestJS + React + PostgreSQL monorepo with:
- Auth \(LDAP/AD + JWT\)
- User management \(4-tier roles\)
- Announcements \(CRUD + categories\)
- File Server \(SMB + ONLYOFFICE collaborative editing\)
- RMS SSO integration
- Docker Compose dev environment

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Groups, Projects, Documents, ONLYOFFICE, CAD viewer \(Rev 021-029\)

Phase 1: Groups & Projects modules with access control
- GroupsModule: CRUD, member management, project subgroups
- ProjectsModule: CRUD, assignments, auto-created default subgroups
- AccessModule: permission rules, resource-based access control
- 8 new entities \(dual-location pattern\), 23+ API endpoints
- Frontend admin pages: GroupsAdmin, ProjectsAdmin

Phase 2: Document Management with MinIO storage
- DocumentsModule: folder hierarchy, file upload/download, versioning
- MinioService \(global\), 3 new entities \(Folder, Document, DocumentVersion\)
- Two-panel Documents page: sidebar folder tree + content area
- List/Grid views, breadcrumb, drag-drop upload, search, context menus
- Folder & document-level permissions with inheritance
- Empty file creation \(Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Text via JSZip templates\)

ONLYOFFICE Integration:
- DocumentEditor \(documents\) + DocumentViewer \(file-server\)
- JWT signing, Redis session management, collaborative editing
- Canvas rendering fix \(display-toggle + CSS clipping removal\)

CAD Viewer \(DWG/DXF\):
- @mlightcad/cad-simple-viewer integration \(client-side, MIT\)
- Worker files served from public/assets \(Docker copies from node_modules\)
- Proper Three.js cleanup on unmount \(animation loop, renderer, DOM\)
- Monkey-patch DWG converter processObjects for layout error bypass

UI: Sidebar/topbar cleanup, Settings page placeholder, version display

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: CadViewer sidebar disappearing - clean up library-injected style tags

Root cause: @mlightcad/cad-simple-viewer injects 4-5 <style> elements into
<head> during initialization but never removes them on destroy\(\). These
orphaned style tags corrupt Vite dev server''s CSS injection, causing
Tailwind media queries \(hidden lg:block\) to fail - sidebar stayed
display:none despite viewport > 1024px.

- Add cleanupLibraryStyles\(\) to remove all library style tags on unmount
- Simplify cleanupDocManager\(\) and remove debug logging
- Add safety net in Documents.tsx to force sidebar display after close
- Archive CHANGELOG 021-030, add Rev 032, bump to v1.0.032

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
